name: 2022 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Technologies and Applications
content: The 2022 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Technologies and Applications (ICAITA 2022) hosted by Changchun University of Science and Technology and co-organized by Academic Exchange Information Center(AEIC) will be held on August 19-21 2022\. ICAITA 2022 is to bring together innovative academics and industrial experts in the field of Artificial Intelligence Technologies and Applications to a common forum. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental activities in Artificial Intelligence Technologies and Applications and another goal is to promote scientific information interchange between researchers developers engineers students and practitioners working all around the world. The conference will be held every year to make it an ideal platform for people to share views and experiences in Artificial Intelligence Technologies and Applications and related areas. Important Dates Full Paper Submission Date: July 10 2022 Notification of Acceptance Date: Within one week of submission Registration Deadline: July 9 2022 Final Paper Submission Date: July 4 2022 Conference Dates: August 19 to 21 2022 publication of ICAITA 2019-2021(History) All accepted papers were published by Journal of Physics: Conference Series(JPCS) and have been indexed by EI.(more detail please check on the office website -http://www.icaita.cn/ ) Call For Papers The topics of interest for submission include but are not limited to: Artificial Intelligence Applications & Technologies Reasoning and Evolution Artificial Neural Networks Philosophy and Artificial Intelligence Artificial Intelligence tools & Applications Pervasive Computing and Ambient Intelligence Bayesian Networks Non-classical Computing and Novel Computing Models Bioinformatics Evolutionary Inspired Computing Cognitive Science Foundations of Artificial Intelligence Data Mining Fuzzy Logic and Methods DNA Computing and Quantum Computing Machine Learning Computational Theories of Learning Multiagent Systems Computing and the Mind Natural Computing Natural Language Processing Knowledge representation; Knowledge-based Systems Neuroinformatics Intelligent System Architectures; Intelligent Web Robotics Parallel Processing; Pattern Recognition; Programming Languages Other related research... organizers: Changchun University of Science and Technology、Academic Exchange Information Center(AEIC)
